name: Burning World
description:
Try the open prototype for free!

The uncovery of a strange device leading to an alternate reality has lead to the downfall of Facility 8C. Almost all site staff have been consumed into the Burning World and it is unknown what is on the other side. You are in the facility, but things are not what they seem. Welcome to the Burning World.

Gameplay

Explore the randomly generated coridoors of the burning world, and seek for your escape, but be vigiliant, because this alternate reality is filled with strange entities, that seem to dispise your presence.

Development Plan

The current plan for development is to add more rooms into the game, and more enemies. I am also looking to add different zones which will be accessable by lift shafts which will require a keycard to enter.

Featured Content and Reviews No reviews, I would be delighted if you could leave a review or comment!

Note, if a DLL file is missing, please tell me.
